languages.text: "Значит, Теодора фон Валанциус мертва. Я передам маршалу Страксу эту прискорбную весть".
"So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."
languages.original_text: "Значит, Теодора фон Валанциус мертва. Я передам маршалу Страксу эту прискорбную весть".

traits.locale_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver the tragic news to Marshal Strachs."
"So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver the tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

"So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."
"So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius ist also tot. Ich werde Marschall Strachs diese tragische Nachricht überbringen."
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius ist also tot. Ich werde Marschall Strachs diese tragische Nachricht überbringen."

languages.text: « Ainsi, Théodora von Valancius est morte. Je vais transmettre cette tragique nouvelle au maréchal Strachs. »
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, Théodora von Valancius est morte. Je vais transmettre cette tragique nouvelle au maréchal Strachs. »

languages.text: «Así que Theodora von Valancius ha muerto. Comunicaré la mala nueva al mariscal Strachs».
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: «Así que Theodora von Valancius ha muerto. Comunicaré la mala nueva al mariscal Strachs».

languages.text: “原来西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯已不幸身故，我会把这个坏消息告知斯塔克斯元帅。”
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: “原来西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯已不幸身故，我会把这个坏消息告知斯塔克斯元帅。”

languages.text: 「では、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは亡くなったのですね。この訃報は、私がストラッチス将帥に伝えます」
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: 「では、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは亡くなったのですね。この訃報は、私がストラッチス将帥に伝えます」

languages.text: "Demek Theodora von Valancius öldü. Bu korkunç haberi derhâl Miralay Strachs'a iletmem gerek."
languages.original_text: "So, Theodora von Valancius is dead. I will deliver this tragic news to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Demek Theodora von Valancius öldü. Bu korkunç haberi derhâl Miralay Strachs'a iletmem gerek."
